infos.value: I will now explain how to use Ovalite.

By using Ovalite,
you will be able to enhance your abilities efficiently.
Be sure to try them out.

◆ Ovalite ◆
This item increases the amount of JP acquired when clearing quests.

◆ Ovalite Button ◆
Each unit in your Formation has an
Ovalite button that you can tap
to open the Ovalite selection screen.

◆ Ovalite Selection Screen ◆
By choosing the amount and type of Ovalite
you would like to use and confirming,
Ovalite use will be set to ON.

When embarking with Ovalite use set to ON
you will consume one Ovalite when clearing a quest,
and your JP acquisition will be increased according to the type of Ovalite consumed.

When multiple types of Ovalite are selected,
the Ovalite with the greatest effect
will be consumed first.
Proceed to a tutorial on Ovalite?
